entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:01 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -18.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mary's Harbour 05:17 AM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -18.8°C
Pressure: 96.8 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Wind Chill: -32
Dewpoint: -24.4°C
Wind: WSW 35 km/h gust 54 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 1 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 70 gusting to 90 in the evening then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
